Module com.example.pizasson
Package com.example.pizasson.utils

Class RegularExpression

java.lang.Object
com.example.pizasson.utils.RegularExpression
public class RegularExpression extends Object
Class that helps to validate if any unwanted character or digit is entered.
Author:
Santiago Caballero

  • Method Details

    • getRegularExpression

      public static RegularExpression getRegularExpression()
      This method do the unique instance in all program of this class in case there isn't an instance of this class.
      Returns:
      RegularExpression to get the unique instance.

    • validateLetters

      public boolean validateLetters(String answer)
      Method to validate letters or words inserted
      Parameters:
      answer - the word to validate
      Returns:
      true if the word has other character besides of letters

    • validateNumbers

      public boolean validateNumbers(String answer)
      Helps to verify if there are numbers in the entered answer. Checks if the user entered just numbers and not symbols or letters
      Parameters:
      answer - the numbers to validate
      Returns:
      true if the answer has other character besides of numbers

    • validateSymbols

      public boolean validateSymbols(String answer)
      Helps to verify if there are symbols in the entered answer. Checks if the user entered symbols in those fields where they should not be entered.
      Parameters:
      answer - User entered answer
      Returns:
      false if it contains no symbols and true if it contains 1 or more symbols.

    • validateEmail

      public boolean validateEmail(String answer)
      Method to match the answer received with a regular email expression to validate an email format
      Parameters:
      answer - to compare with the regularExpression
      Returns:
      true if the email matches with the email format and false if not
